text: (nabiye!) vamcanikayinda, hrdayanhi (papatara) asanipayen pelennanda, madinavehi boru pracara karannanda, (tamange napuren min pasuva ho) æt novuvahot niyata vasayenma api obalava ovun kerehi polambava athæra damannemu. pasuva itamat tika dinak misa, ehi obage samipayehi ovunta vasaya kirimata nohæka
